Uses of Package
playn.core.gl

  • Packages that use playn.core.gl 
    Package Description
    playn.core  
    playn.core.canvas  
    playn.core.gl  
  • Classes in playn.core.gl used by playn.core 
    Class and Description
    GL20
    Platform-independent interface and values for OpenGL ES 2.0, based on the official JOGL GL2ES2 interface.
    GLContext 
    GLShader
    Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.
    Scale
    Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.
  • Classes in playn.core.gl used by playn.core.canvas 
    Class and Description
    GLShader
    Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.
    Scale
    Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.
  • Classes in playn.core.gl used by playn.core.gl 
    Class and Description
    AbstractImageGL 
    GL20
    Platform-independent interface and values for OpenGL ES 2.0, based on the official JOGL GL2ES2 interface.
    GL20Buffer
    GLBuffer implementation based on java.nio and usable with GL20.
    GLBuffer
    An abstraction over bulk buffers for use with GLShader and GLProgram.
    GLBuffer.Float
    A buffer of 32-bit floats.
    GLBuffer.Short
    A buffer of 16-bit unsigned integers.
    GLContext 
    GLContext.Filter
    Used to configure texture image scaling.
    GLContext.Stats
    Used to track and report rendering statistics.
    GLProgram
    Provides the GL methods and buffer management needed to implement a GL shader.
    GLShader
    Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.
    GLShader.Attrib
    Provides the ability to bind a vertex attrib array.
    GLShader.Core
    Implements the core of the indexed tris shader.
    GLShader.Extras
    Handles the extra bits needed when we're using textures or flat color.
    GLShader.Uniform1f
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform float value.
    GLShader.Uniform1i
    Provides the ability to bind a single uniform int.
    GLShader.Uniform2f
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform float pair.
    GLShader.Uniform2fv
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform vec2 vector.
    GLShader.Uniform2i
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform int pair.
    GLShader.Uniform3f
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform float triple.
    GLShader.Uniform4f
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform float four-tuple.
    GLShader.Uniform4fv
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform vec4 vector.
    GLShader.UniformMatrix4fv
    Provides the ability to bind a uniform matrix4 vector.
    GroupLayerGL 
    ImmediateLayerGL 
    LayerGL 
    Scale
    Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.
    Scale.ScaledResource
    Used by Scale.getScaledResources(java.lang.String).
    SurfaceGL
